user_instruction: 'Tell John to send me (sarah.connor@investments.com) a summary of our discussion from the Global Business Hub meeting, and remind him to review his Notion for the details.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Global Business Hub Meeting Summary

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well.

Could you please send me a concise written summary of the key points and action items from our recent discussion at the Global Business Hub? Please forward it to sarah.connor@investments.com at your earliest convenience.

Also, when you get a chance, please review the detailed notes and materials in your Notion workspace to ensure we’re aligned on next steps.

Thank you, John!

Best,
Sarah

final_output:

Sarah
